promptVersions.body:
New functionality has just been introduced to make raising Credit Management Requests and engaging with the Credit Management Team quick, simple and consistent with other Deal Support Requests (DSRs).


To raise a Credit Management Request, simply click the button titled ‘New Credit Management Request’ above to be guided through the pre-populated form.


Once you have completed the form you can keep track of the status of your Request in the ‘My DSRs’ view.


All correspondence to the Credit Management Team relating to Credit Management Requests should be made via the Salesforce Credit Management Request workflow.
promptVersions.title: Simplifying these requests
